## luminance variable

Multi-method to compute relative luminance from any supported input color format. Unless color already is an RGBA or ARGB int (plain or wrapped), it will first be converted to RGBA.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
luminance: MultiFn1O<number | string | ReadonlyColor | IColor, ColorMode, number>
```
